name: Child Of Yggdrasil
immune: acid, cold; bludgeoning from nonmagical weapons

trait.name: Acid Touch
text: As an action, the child of Yggdrasil destroys one nonmagical object that isn't being worn or carried, such as a rope, plank, candlestick, or even an entire bronze cauldron.

trait.name: Forest Camouflage
text: The child of Yggdrasil has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in forest terrain.

trait.name: Keen Smell
text: The child of Yggdrasil has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The child of Yggdrasil makes three claw attacks.

action.name: Claw
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) acid damage.
